channel.title: maven on Devflection
channel.description: Recent content in maven on Devflection

item.title: Apache Maven Part 3 - Inheritance, aggregation and multi-module projects
item.author: matija@devflection.com (Matija Heričko)
item.description:
This multi-post series is looking at Apache Maven.
In this third part, we will have a look at inheritance and aggregation in Maven and how everything comes together to form multi-module Maven projects.

item.title: Apache Maven Part 2 - Build lifecycle and Apache Maven Plugins
item.author: matija@devflection.com (Matija Heričko)
item.description: This multi-post series is looking at Apache Maven. In the second part, we will take a closer look at the build lifecycle and the workers in Maven - Maven Plugins.

item.title: Apache Maven Part 1 - Introduction and basics
item.author: matija@devflection.com (Matija Heričko)
item.description: This multi-post series will be looking at Apache Maven. In this first part, we will provide a high-level overview, explain some of the basics and show an example of a simple Maven managed project.
